statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 3 \\ -4 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 2 \\ 0 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -17 \\ 12 \\ 31 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 18 \\ -16 \\ -32 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 4 \\ -5 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 1 \\ 4 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] span or don't span \mathbb{R}^4.
